item.title: How to make/lose money with buying dips
item.description: Overview: Analyzes stock data for RSI dips below a specified lower threshold and subsequent rises above a higher threshold. Simulates buy and sell actions based on these RSI movements Calculates potential profits/losses from these simulated trades Provides a summary of dips and performance metrics Source [GitHub] https://github.com/namuan/trading-utils/blob/main/rsi_dips.py See the top of the script on how to run it
